languages.text:
Requires Overseer to have Hereticus — 5
Cyber Eagle has +20 Perception and Agility, and +250% Damage
If Cyber Eagle dodged an attack from Obstructed enemy, that enemy attacks itself, dealing +100% damage. This attack can't be parried dodged or blocked.

traits.locale_text:
Requires Overseer to have Hereticus — 5
Cyber Eagle has +20 Perception and Agility, and +250% Damage
If Cyber Eagle dodged an attack from Obstructed enemy, that enemy attacks itself, dealing +100% damage. This attack can't be parried dodged or blocked.

languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy, that enemy makes an attack against themselves, dealing +100% more damage. It cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy, that enemy makes an attack against themselves, dealing +100% more damage. It cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик
Киберорел получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.
Когда киберорел {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки противника, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, этот противник атакует самого себя, нанося на 100% больше урона, который нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокировать{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} и от которого нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}.

Когда киберорел{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary} уклоняется{/g} от атаки противника, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, этот противник атакует самого себя, нанося на 100% больше урона, который нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокировать{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} и от которого нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}.

Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — фанатик
Киберорел получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и наносит на 250% больше урона.
Когда киберорел {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки противника, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, этот противник атакует самого себя, нанося на 100% больше урона, который нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блокировать{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} и от которого нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーイーグルは +20 の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}を得て、ダメージが+250%増加する。サイバーイーグルが{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵による攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたびに、その敵は自分自身に攻撃を行い、ダメージが+100%増加する。
この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できない。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy, that enemy makes an attack against themselves, dealing +100% more damage. It cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 狂信者が必要
サイバーイーグルは +20 の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}を得て、ダメージが+250%増加する。サイバーイーグルが{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵による攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたびに、その敵は自分自身に攻撃を行い、ダメージが+100%増加する。
この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}できない。

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Eiferer
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Außerdem verursacht er +250 % Schaden.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler einem Angriff des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, attackiert sich dieser Gegner selbst und verursacht +100 % mehr Schaden. Der Schaden kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}geblockt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} und ihm kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g} werden.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy, that enemy makes an attack against themselves, dealing +100% more damage. It cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Eiferer
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Außerdem verursacht er +250 % Schaden.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler einem Angriff des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegners {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, attackiert sich dieser Gegner selbst und verursacht +100 % mehr Schaden. Der Schaden kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}geblockt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} und ihm kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g} werden.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber kartal, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber kartal, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmanın yaptığı bir saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} o düşman, kendine bir saldırı yaparak +%100 daha fazla hasar verir. Saldırıya karşı {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} yapılamaz.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy, that enemy makes an attack against themselves, dealing +100% more damage. It cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Bağnaz kanaati gerektirir
Siber kartal, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} kazanır. Ayrıca +%250 daha fazla hasar verir.
Siber kartal, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmanın yaptığı bir saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} o düşman, kendine bir saldırı yaparak +%100 daha fazla hasar verir. Saldırıya karşı {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} yapılamaz.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Zélote.
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de +20 et inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque lancée par un adversaire {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}, cet ennemi s'attaque lui-même et s'inflige 100 % de dégâts supplémentaires. Ne peut être {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqué{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}paré{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivé{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy, that enemy makes an attack against themselves, dealing +100% more damage. It cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Zélote.
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de +20 et inflige +250 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-aigle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque lancée par un adversaire {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}, cet ennemi s'attaque lui-même et s'inflige 100 % de dégâts supplémentaires. Ne peut être {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqué{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}paré{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivé{/g}.

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Fanático
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
Cada vez que la ciberáguila {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque efectuado por el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}, ese enemigo se ataca a sí mismo con un +100 % de daño adicional. Este ataque no puede {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquearse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararse{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivarse{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, and it deals +250% more damage.
Whenever the cyber-eagle {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack made by the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy, that enemy makes an attack against themselves, dealing +100% more damage. It cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Fanático
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} e inflige un +250 % de daño adicional.
Cada vez que la ciberáguila {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque efectuado por el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}, ese enemigo se ataca a sí mismo con un +100 % de daño adicional. Este ataque no puede {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloquearse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararse{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivarse{/g}.

languages.text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——狂热者
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高250%。
每当生化猎鹰{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}了{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人发动的攻击时，该名敌人都会立刻攻击自身，且造成的伤害提高100%。此次攻击无法被{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。

It cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocked{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高250%。
每当生化猎鹰{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}了{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人发动的攻击时，该名敌人都会立刻攻击自身，且造成的伤害提高100%。此次攻击无法被{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}。
